title: Mann Mohana Song Lyrics Jodhaa Akbar
stanzas:
Manu mohanaa
Manu mohanaa
ennuyir kannaa
kaarmugil vannaa varaayo
kodhaiyin kuralai kelaayo

vida petru vaaraai
kaasi mathuraa
vidai solla vaaraai
vazhkai pudhiraa

nee indri suyamvaramaa
kaarmugil vannaa vaaraayo
kannaa
kodhaiyin kuralai kelaayo..

Dhvaragane irulum oliyum
iruvizhi arugae thurathiduthe
irudhayathil thunaiyaaga
nee irukka maattaayaa ?

iruvazhigal sandhikkum idathil
kaalgal irandum kuzhambiduthe
enpaathai sollvaayaa?
dhevagi nandhalaalaa
dhisai yedhu sollvaayaa

Brindhavana nandhakumaaraa
sagiyin venduthal arivaayaa
neengaamal varuvaayaa
nagam pole pirivaayaa?

navaneethaa murali manogaraa
nangaiyin manathai purivaayaa?
purakkanithe selvaayaa

Manu mohanaa
Manu mohanaa
Manu mohanaa
Manu mohanaa
ennuyir kannaa
kaarmugil vannaa varaayo
kodhaiyin kuralai kelaayo

Purushothamane un udhatil
puzhanguzhaai thavalvenaa
un swasam kaatraale
uyir petru vazhvenaa

parthibane un paarvayile
paarkadal amudham
peruvenaa
pasi thaagam marappenaa

vazhkayenum kadalil
thinamum alaiyin mele
alai adikka
idhyam enum padagu adhil
thadumaari modhiduthe

thooyavane thuduppugal potu
karaiyin yaetri viduvaayaa
nadukadalil viduvaa
vaseegara vanumaali
en vedhanai theeraayo
